title: I Can Only Use One Kind of Magic, but I Say I Hit the Jackpot if it Lets Me Flirt with a Cool and Cute Dark Elf - Novel Updates
tags: Elves   Lack of Common Sense   Male Protagonist   Perverted Protagonist
author: Kamachi Kazuma   鎌池和馬
description: Klaus Knockburn, an apprentice scientist from the Court Magic Academy, ventured deep into the forest in search for the legendary clan he’s long obsessed of, the Dark Elves.>
